column2: an A.M. Eatery////Was in the area and remembered a friend had recommended the place to me
column3: decided to give it a try. The wait was minimal
column4: made easier by the drinks that we got
column5: and we were quickly seated by the friendly staff. Wait for food time was a bit longer than the actual wait
column7: the food was amazing. Girlfriend got the classic breakfast and everything was made to order
column8: the bacon slightly too burnt but wasn't that much of an issue. I had the Havana Daydreaming which both of us were delighted by. We now have plans to come by at least once a month!
